Name: Hydro Jaw
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Electric-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Totodile, Croconaw, and Feraligatr.  You can get a Hydro Jaw at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Feral-Claw, a Feral-Fang, and a Feral-Crest. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
